name: Inhuman Kaleidoscope
description:
A story of a weak, young girl who enters into a covenant with a mysterious being and fulfills her dream of being a hero. Very short game with little interaction, you could probably clear it in a few minutes.

Music sources: KIRA☆KIRA, Eclipse -Zettai Reido Keikaku Soushitsu Shoujo-, DESIRE Haitoku no Rasen
Backgrounds: COCOON - Ruta
